SELECT DISTINCT A.BIMOK_CD AS bimokCd, A.ACC_YEAR AS accYear, A.BIMOK_NM AS bimokNm, A.PARENT_BIMOK AS parentBimok, A.ACNT_CD AS acntCd, A.ASSI_SUB_CD AS assiSubCd, A.BIMOK_LEVEL AS bimokLevel, A.FIN_YN AS finYn, A.USE_YN AS useYn, A.GOVE_APRC_YN AS goveAprcYn, A.BUDG_GUIDE AS budgGuide, B.ACNT_NM AS acntNm, B.CRE_DEB_DIV AS creDebDiv, C.ASSI_SUB_NM AS assiSubNm, D.DEPT_COUNT AS deptCount FROM AB_BUDG_BIMOK A LEFT OUTER JOIN AE_ACC_ACNT B ON A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN AE_ASSI_SUB C ON A.ASSI_SUB_CD = C.ASSI_SUB_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BIMOK_CD, COUNT(*) AS DEPT_COUNT FROM AB_BUDG_USE_DEPT WHERE ACC_YEAR = #{accYear} GROUP BY bimok_cd ) D ON A.BIMOK_CD = D.BIMOK_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.ACC_YEAR = #{accYear}
AND A.BIMOK_NM LIKE '%' || #{bimokNm} || '%'
AND B.ACNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{acntNm} || '%'
AND A.USE_YN = CASE #{useYn} WHEN '1' THEN 'Y' WHEN '2' THEN 'N' END
AND A.FIN_YN = #{finYn}
AND A.BIMOK_CD IN ( SELECT BIMOK_CD FROM AB_BUDG_USE_DEPT WHERE USE_DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} )
ORDER BY A.BIMOK_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AB_BUDG_BIMOK ( USE_YN, PARENT_BIMOK, ACC_YEAR, BIMOK_CD, ACNT_CD, BIMOK_NM, FIN_YN, BIMOK_LEVEL, ASSI_SUB_CD, GOVE_APRC_YN ) VALUES ( #{useYn}, #{parentBimok}, #{accYear}, #{bimokCd}, #{acntCd}, #{bimokNm}, #{finYn}, #{bimokLevel}, #{assiSubCd}, #{goveAprcYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AB_BUDG_BIMOK SET USE_YN=#{useYn}, PARENT_BIMOK=#{parentBimok}, ACC_YEAR=#{accYear}, BUDG_GUIDE=#{budgGuide}, ACNT_CD=#{acntCd}, BIMOK_NM=#{bimokNm}, FIN_YN=#{finYn}, BIMOK_LEVEL=#{bimokLevel}, ASSI_SUB_CD=#{assiSubCd}, GOVE_APRC_YN=#{goveAprcYn} WHERE ACC_YEAR = #{accYear} AND BIMOK_CD = #{bimokCd}
